definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: What are the cooking methods of Shandong dishes?
sentences.chinese: 鲁菜的烹饪方法有哪些？

sentences.english: This is a famous Shandong cuisine.
In Yantai, you must taste some authentic flavor of the original styles of AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 在烟台，您一定要品尝一下正宗的原滋原味的鲁菜。

sentences.english: Shandong cuisine is an important part of China's cuisine system.
sentences.chinese: 鲁菜是中国烹饪领域中的重要菜系。

sentences.english: Shandong cuisine is generally salty, with a prevalence of light-colored sauces.
sentences.chinese: 鲁菜通常较咸，汁色普遍较浅。

sentences.english: Shandong cuisine is one of the eight great traditions of Chinese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 山东菜，又叫鲁菜，是中国八大菜系之一。

definition: dish consisting of stir-fried potato, eggplant and green pepper
